oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baldwin, Victoria A., 1919 May 19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Mrs. Victoria A. Baldwin, dated May 19th, 1919. Illustrates the first page of the document. Baldwin’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on July 23rd, 1919. Among the named beneficiaries in Baldwin’s will are several charitable organizations, such as Old Ladies Home; United Charities, and Protestant Orphan Asylum. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baldwin family
